RelationshipElement.name: Cemetery - Plot
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

RelationshipElement.name: Plot - Marker
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

RelationshipElement.name: Marker - Burial
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

RelationshipElement.name: Marker - Motif
RelationshipElement.description: A 1-to-n relationship between the parent and its children, respectively.

property.name: Cemetery Site Location
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

lookup.term: {Engraved} Incised or chiselled into the material of the marker
{Lead} Individual lead letters attached to the marker
{Engraved_and_Painted} Incised into the material with painted letters
{Painted_Only} No incision, letters painted directly on to the marker

property.name: Mason
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.name: Style of Languages
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

lookup.term: {Emotive} Use of emotive words or phrases to describe them or their death.
{Biographical} Details about their life, e.g. where they were born, where they lived, etc
{Factual} No embellishment, use of simple and direct language.
{Religious} e.g. Bible verses, or appeals to God

property.name: Key Wording
property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

property.formatString: {{if $1 then $1}}{{if and($1, $2) then " " }}{{if $2 then $2}}{{if $3 then " ($3)"}}{{if between($4,0,0.49) then "??" elsif lessThan($4,1) then "?" }}

lookup.term: {Written_in_first_person___I____Me__} First person (as if the deceased is speaking directly to you – “I”, “Me”)
{Written_in_third_person___He____She__} Third person (the deceased is being spoken about – “He”, “She”)

lookup.term: {On_Marker} Identify all motifs incorporated into the marker/headstone. This includes the shape of the marker and all engraved, painted or applied motifs.
{On_Fence_Other} Identify all motifs incorporated into the fence or other fittings/furnishings.
